Content: A felicitation ceremony was held at the Presidential Secretariat President Maithripala Sirisena to recognize artistes who won international awards. President Maithripala Sirisena handed over cash awards to the artistes who won awards at the International Film and Television Awards ceremonies this year. The artistes who bagged awards at the Niece Awards in France, the Osaka Asian Film Festival in Japan and the Moscow International Film and Television Awards. Accordingly, Nita Fernando ,NilminiSigera,Kumara Karavdeniya,ShiranRatnayake,Ranga Bandaranaike ,AthulaPeiris and Nishadi Bandaranaike received their cash awards from the President. Meanwhile, the President also made a donation for the alumni of the University of Peradeniya. The President also donated money to the sportsmen and women who are leaving for the World Gymnastic Festival and the Sri Lanka Police Cricket Team attending the International Police Cricket Festival.
